thread.title: Dustin Laurain
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Dustin Laurain

author: Dustin Laurain
title: Dustin Laurain
text: Patty was a great saleswoman and helped me out with whatever I was looking for. She let me know the best deals or bang for my buck. I went in with an idea of what I wanted and the process was easy and quick. They delivered it quickly and early in the morning. The 3 delivery guys were friendly and quick. Appreciated that a lot. Thanks!
